title: By the King a proclamation to declare His Maiesties pleasure, that a former restraint inioyned to the citizens of London, for repairing to faires for a time, is now set at libertie.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
